data.text: I, Isaiah, the son of Amoz, received from Yahweh this message about Babylon city:
Lift up a flag on the bare top of a hill,
Yahweh says, “I have commanded those soldiers to do that;
Listen to the noise on the mountains,
They come from countries that are far away,
You people of Babylon will scream because you will be terrified,
All of your people will be very afraid [DOU],
All of you will be terrified.
Listen to this: The day that Yahweh has appointed/chosen is near,
When that happens, none of the stars will shine.
Yahweh says, “I will punish everyone in the world for the evil things that they do;
And because I will cause most people to die,
I will shake the sky,
And all the foreigners in Babylon will run around like [SIM] deer that are being hunted,
Anyone who is captured in Babylon
Their little children will be dashed to pieces on the rocks while their parents watch;
Look! I am going to incite the people of Media to attack Babylon.
With their arrows, the soldiers of Media will shoot the young men of Babylon;
Babylon has been a very beautiful [MTY] city;
No one will ever live in Babylon again.
Instead, animals that live in the desert will be there;
Hyenas will howl in the ruined towers,
